propositions.text: 怜香惜玉录 is a narrative work.
The work is structured into sections.
Chapter One (篇章一) includes 'Dawn' (拂晓), 'Noon' (晌午), and 'Dusk' (黄昏).
Chapter Two (篇章二) includes 'First Meeting' (初遇), 'Getting Acquainted' (相知), and 'Parting' (离别).
Chapter Three (篇章三) includes 'Longing' (思念), 'Reunion' (重逢), and 'Eternity' (永恒).

concepts.name: 序曲

concepts.context: The main divisions or chapters of the work.

hierarchy.structure: The document is a hierarchical structure with a main title, followed by an overture, three main chapters, each containing sub-sections, and a finale. The chapter titles suggest a narrative progression.
